lead_paragraph: Russia holding midfielder Igor Denisov suffered a hamstring injury as they were held to a 1-1 draw by Serbia on Sunday and is expected to miss Euro 2016, said coach Leonid Slutskiy.

headline.print_headline: Russia's Denisov Injured in Serbia Draw, Set to Miss Euros
headline.main: Russia's Denisov Injured in Serbia Draw, Set to Miss Euros
